Fly Mobile Price - Buy Latest Fly Mobiles Phone

The fly mobile phones are the most advanced mobiles available. The company claims to exceed expectations in mainly three distinct ways, i.e. the features that are packed with the latest ones in the mobile, the look of the phone, the last but not the least the most amazing price of the Fly mobile phone. The Fly mobile company was the first one ever to create the slimmest mobile phone in 2003 in the whole world along with all the attractive features.

Launches Nokia C6 Mobile

The new Nokia C6 is rumored mobile phone. As shown above in the picture , the new Nokia C6 will feature a Mini QWERTY keypad .It will have mettalic back cover .The key expected features of the new Nokia mobile phone are :QWERTY keypad,GSM Quad band,WiFi,Bluetooth,Camera with LED flash,Stereo FM radio,3.5mm headphone jack,Music and Video player.

Stylish Micromax EZpad Q3 Mobile

This is a dual sim addition made to the present list of Micromax mobile series. Today, if you move out any of the Micromax mobile shop, Micromax EZpad is sure to be the first show by the shopkeeper.

It has gained a lot of admiration for being a love to business class users who often search out for phones that can help them in simplifying their work without breaking up their work chain. This is smart and sleek mobile model is quite convenient to handle that adds another star to its review ratings.

Apart from its look and feel, it has got a 2.2 inch screen which enables the users to read text on its display without puttying much of strain to eyes

Samsung Guru 1070 Mobile Phone

This is the first addition set under Samsung Guru Series. The launch of Samsung 1070 has set the market on fire. it is a small phone that has got to feature small price but is enwrapped with a great list of features. This common aspect in this Samsung mobile phone we have the well-equipped features like Speaker Phones, Multiple Alarms, advanced mobile tracker, 65 K color CSTN display.

The samsung guru 1070 is seen up to as a quite trendy mobile Handset and thus it boasts of a Bright Torch Light feature. This Samsung Guru 1070 mobile phone has got to offer a long lasting light that runs up to 40 hrs torch times. It includes the enhancement of some of their earlier features. This Samsung mobile offers 12 hours of uninterrupted talk time along it has 40 polyphonic ringtones.

Sony Ericsson Mobile

Sony Ericsson has introduced several good quality mobile phones for the most upwardly mobile professionals. Almost all the Sony Ericsson mobile phones are designed to have best features seen in latest mobile phones. They are sleek and smart looking [url=]mobile phones[/url] . They look gorgeous and perfect for professional needs.
Most of these mobile phones are known for their cameras and music quality. Though, this company has produced several mobile phones, there are two highly popular series; Walkman and Cybershot. These two series of phones have brought lots of revenue and fame to the company. Though earlier, Sony Ericsson couldn’t make its mark in the mobile phone industry, these two series shot it to fame instantly. Now this company gives a fighting competition to all the other tough competitors.

Dual SIM mobiles

These dual SIM mobiles are highly functional for all purposes. These mobiles are great craze among youngsters these days. Most of the people such as professionals, sales persons, young executive and other require carrying two mobile phones for various personal and professional reasons. With a Dual SIM mobile phone, you need not carry two mobile handsets in your pockets if you want to use two numbers.

These mobiles are of great use for the professionals who travel a lot. These people carry two mobile phones to avoid roaming mobile charges. For that purpose, they carry two SIM cards, one for local calls and other for STD purposes.

A dual Sim [url=]mobile phone[/url] allows the user to use two numbers on a single handset at a time. There are several benefits of using Dual SIM mobiles. They save a lot of money and hassles of carrying two phones.

Nokia C Series Mobile Phone prices

This mobile phone comes with Ovi services with Ovi Share making. You can easily upload and share photos and videos with your friends. At the same time, you can synchronize your contacts and calendar with PC to become more organized. You can easily access online email account from providers such as Google Mail. In addition, you can use popular instant messaging services.

If you are a music buff, this Nokia phone is the perfect companion for you. It comes with a music player and music managers that can easily borrow tracks from your PC downloaded from Nokia Music Store and upload them to the handset. Moreover, FM stereo radio feature let you enjoy the live music and news at anytime of the day. There is an option to use headphones through 3.5mm jack connection.

Like other Nokia mobiles , this phone also has the great memory storage. It has the 50 MB of Internal memory. Furthermore, you can add 16 GB of expandable memory. It can store large number of photos, videos and music.

Samsung Launched New Samsung B3210 Corby TXT

This Samsung Mobile comes with great connectivity options. It has GPRS Class 10, EDGE Class 10. However, it lacks Wi-Fi and 3G support. In addition, it has built-in Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP connection. It has wireless Bluetooth v2.1 connection with Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP). It helps you enjoy music on Bluetooth compatible wire-free headset and that too in full stereo.

Due to the presence of EDGE network connection, it allows faster data transmissions, faster downloads and files transfers. Bluetooth technology provided in this phone let you connect other Bluetooth compatible device conveniently. You can connect devices and gadgets like color printers, PDAs, laptops and others for data transfer, print jobs and instant sync ups within no time.

This Samsung Corby TXT comes with single integrated 2.0MP digital camera. It has maximum still picture resolution of 1600 X 1200 pixels. This camera has autofocus, built-in LED flash light, 3.3X digital zoom and Smile Detection Support. It also offers photo effects and photo quality settings in case of still pictures. It can store pictures in standard JPEG format in handset memory. It can record an hour of video with sound.

Samsung C3303 Champ features

Samsung C3303 Champ features : TFT resistive touchscreen, 1.3 Mega Pixels camera, Music Player, Bluetooth, FM.

The Samsung C3303 Champ sports the similar premium crystal design chassis found in high-end Samsung TV's. It sports the Touchwiz Lite 2.0 interface which allows easy and fast navigation. The handset is powered by a high capacity 1000mAh battery which gives 12 hrs of talktime.

The Champ sports Samsung's Cartoon UI, coupled with the TouchWiz Lite 2.0, it allows seamless menu navigation. The phone comes with an internal FM receiver and supports FM with recording,it has an MP3 player and allows phonebook and SMS backup to SD card. The device comes with 30 MB internal memory which is expandable up to 8 GB with microSD card. The Samusng C3303 comes with a good set of security features including Fake Call, SOS Message & Advanced Mobile Tracker.

Nokia 5800 price in india

Introduction
Your search for a perfect touch screen entertainment mobile phone is over. Here comes all new Nokia 5800 xpress music phone from the house of Nokia to enrich your lives with your daily dose of music, movies and much more fun on the move! With this phone in your hand you will never have a dull moment again.

Key Features
Nokia, like always, have come up with their best! Nokia 5800 xpress music is the phone loaded with useful features and functions to make your lives more fun. Now get everything at your fingertips from music to movies from videos to photos. One of the striking features that make this phone different from the rest is its large 3.2? screen for viewing crisp and clear image.
Nokia 5800 xpress music comes with integrated Bluetooth and USB 2.0 full speed with micro-USB connector. This give you the option of transferring data quickly even with the devices that do not support Bluetooth. The phone also comes with MicroSD memory card slot hot swappable, expandable up to 16 GB. With the internal storage capacity of up to 81 MB you can store you favorite music or important documents.

Design
The dimensions of the phone are 111 x 51.7 x 15.5 mm and with the weight of 109 grams, Nokia 5800 xpress music is lightweight which you can easily carry around. Its bar form factor actually fits well in hands or pockets.
Display screen of 3.2? with resolution 640 x 360 and up to 16 million colors gives you stunning clarity and detailed picture quality.

Entertainment Features
This is for party people, who want entertainment on the go! Insert the earphone and start grooving to the ultimate party mix. You can also the play the pre-loaded games when you.
Take stunning pictures or record videos with Nokia 5800 xpress music ?s 3.2 megapixels camera and share your moments of joy with your family and friends. Its picture resolution of up to 2048 x 1536 pixels gives you crisp and clear picture so that you don?t miss on any smallest details.

Conclusion
This is a real entertainment phone for smart fun loving people. It features all the advance features but the only demerit is it doesn?t features Infrared which some of them may require. Except that everything is perfect which makes this phone a must buy gadget.

Nokia X2 Price in India

Introduction
"Nokia X2" debuts Indian market as a much simpler and cheaper music centric phone that can attract young consumers.

Design
The Nokia X2 is a terminal type tablet phone with a simple design. The slim phone with sharp edges is available in two discrete colors: black and silver , combined with red lines and blue buttons. It weighs just 81 grams. You are facing a 2.2-inch TFT relatively small compared with that of its predecessors. The handset boasts of a conventional alphanumeric keyboard and a track pad that will help to access the menu options. The side buttons also work as shortcuts to control music or camera.

Multimedia
The Nokia X2 is specially designed for people who do not need a business phone. It is skilled in running multimedia tasks. It features a camera with five megapixel sensor and LED Flash that will allow us to take quality pictures. You can upload photos directly to services such as Ovi or Flickr for your family and friends. As for playback, the Nokia X2 is capable of supporting multiple audio files. It has stereo speakers and allows us to transfer music to computer applications such as Nokia Ovi PC Player or its own Windows Media Player 11. It plays in MP4 format. The user can store files in 48 MB internal memory, expandable with microSD cards up to 16GB.

Connectivity
The phone boasts quad-band connectivity with GPRS. For other connections, we must say it has Bluetooth with A2DP stereo audio profile and USB. Even so, it has direct access to Facebook and the Opera Mini browser. The users can download games and applications via the Ovi Store.

Cons
It lacks 3G and WLAN networks to browse the Internet at high speed.

Verdict
It is a plain and functional phone that stands for what it is. Mainly targeted at the music and imaging oriented young group, it is a great value for money.

Micromax Q1

Best bargain
If you are looking for a budget phone without any compromise on quality and performance then just turn your attention to this amazing Micromax Q1 for an unmatchable performance.

Design
You would just love its eye catching bar design with excellent color combination and solid body. Its clear and wide TFT display offers great clarity even in dark conditions. Its user friendly features make it sell like a hot cake.

Key Features
The best selling point of this phone is its QWERTY keypad at this price tag, which act as a boon while entering text messages. You can now easily transfer your files and data with the incorporated GPRS connection. Its powerful batteries ensure uninterrupted talk time for hours together.

Silent Feature
Its excellent multimedia features like the music player would help you have a chill pill anytime and anywhere. Its dual band ensures great connectivity.

Pros
Its powerful batteries give you great freedom to talk for hours together. The incorporate FM radio would never let you get bore.

Cons
It lacks advance connectivity features like 3G at this price level.

Conclusion
This micromax would surly reach to every common man and win their heart with its latest technology and superb performance.

Micromax Q2

The new Micromax Ezpad Q2 is a QWERTY keypad mobile phone.It is the sibling of the successful Micromax Q3 mobile phone.The main differences between the Micromax Q2 and Micromax Q3 is that the Micromax Q3 has dual SIM GSM option and Bluetooth while the Micromax Q2 is a Single SIM GSM mobile phone and does not have Bluetooth.

Micromax Q3

Introduction
Micromax Ezpad Q3 is a dual sim, dual standby phone meant for the business class and those who frequent networking sites. Keeping the cost factor in view it offers a bundle of features in its kitty within a very affordable price tag.

Design
Design wise it has smart business phone look with a flat black body with a large QWERTY keypad. A 2.2 colorful LCD display adds to the beauty of the phone.

Feature wise
The most attractive feature of this phone is a preloaded mobile social messenger known as Nimbuzz. It?s a boon for the social networking fans that can stay connected with their circle through the phone. The phone comes with QWERTY keypad for easy and fast typing making messaging convenient. Get rid of the hassle of carrying two phones for two numbers as you can talk simultaneously from two numbers without switching off one. You can send large SMS and PHB using Photocall. Its GPRS and WAP connectivity along with conference call facility makes it a perfect business phone for a workaholic.

Bonus
The phone comes with a 1.3 megapixel camera for some quick clicks. Share them conveniently with your friends with the help of Bluetooth. It has a multi-format music player and FM radio with stereo speaker to enliven the atmosphere anytime anywhere.

Verdict
Micromax Ezpad is affordable, looks smart, multifunctional and suits both a youngster as well as a businessman. It is surprisingly lightweight and flat for your pocket. It offers large memory for a variety of functions with the option of expandable memory. You can access all these features at a price that will blow you away.

Nokia C1-00

Nokia C1 is the new Dual SIM mobile phone from Nokia. It is an entry level mobile phone. the new Nokia C1 mobile phone features standby battery time of up to 6 weeks !! .It also supports 500 phonebook entries, and 250 text messages onboard. Targeted at the low-price mobile phone market thereâ??s also some handy features such as a flashlight and an FM radio with a standard 3.5mm headphone jack.It is 15mm thin and weights 73g with the battery and sports a full colour screen.

Micromax Q5C Specifications

The new Micromax Q5C is a CDMA mobile phone featuring full QWERTY keypad and 2 megapixel camera .It is the CDMA version of the popular Micromax Q5 GSM mobile phone.Micromax Q5C mobile phone features :Full QWERTY keypad, Facebook ready, Multi-messenger â?? Nimbuzz, Opera mini browser for fast Internet surfing, 2 megapixel camera, Bluetooth(A2DP), Java, WAP/MMS, Expandable Memory MicroSD upto 4GB, Talk Time:Up to 5 hours and Standby Time:Up to 10 days.

Spice mobile phone

This Spice mobile phone is available with 3 different body colors. Available body colors are Black, Silver and Orange. Listen FM Radio while your are bored and tired of your hectic day. Also favourite Music at your favourite Time. This Spice Mobile Phone has a capacity to store up to 250 songs and listen up to 20 hours of music. Store and play any time you want. Now you can have 1 GB extra space in this spice mobile phone to store your sweet memories. Store your all images and music in this spice mobile phone

Intex-IN 5050

Introduction
This mid range phone from Intex Mobile is power packed with features to give you the worth of every penny you spend on it. With versatility and good quality as its highlight it is sure to win hearts.

Classy Design
Look wise Intex-IN 5050 is smart and carries two SIMs of GSM and CDMA service providers. This sleek candy bar phone has a functional design that also looks good. The silver grey exterior is standard but gives you a feel that it is not a plastic toy. The bright 2.2 inch display with 265k colors is brilliant for any kind of use. The weight is less than 100 grams and the phone is pretty comfortable in your hands. The bright pink stripe on the soft pad that has two keys for switching between the GSM and CDMA network is quite interesting.

Two in One
Intex Mobile is slowly getting into the mid and high range mobile phone market by introducing advanced features like multi-SIM and CDMA network connectivity. Many a times you prefer to carry two different numbers for professional and personal use. With Intex-IN 5050, you are relieved from carrying two phones as you can carry one GSM and one CDMA connections in the same handset. While receiving calls, the phone has the capability to flash which SIM card is presently receiving the call, along with other call details. You also have dual standby and dual speakers to access both the SIMs together.

Great Entertainment
With this optimum flexibility as its highlight Intex Mobile IN 5050 sports a range of features that are truly excellent for multitasking. The dual band phone has both WAP and GPRS connectivity to handle SMS and MSS. It scores as a multimedia device as it gives you an mp3/mp4 player, FM radio and a 1.3 megapixel camera for some quick casual snaps. The support of T-flash card upto 2GB works as a booster to its multimedia capabilities.

Cons
It is still an entry level phone when you consider features other than the dual SIM.

Verdict
Intex Mobile will appeal to its target group. It has good looks backed up by functionality. Intex-IN 5050 will cater to communication needs of masses by offering simple & better technology at an attractive price.

Nokia C5: Smart, Trendy and Efficient Smartphone

Today, people don’t want to use just a mobile phone, they want to use a mobile phone with unique mobile possibilities. A cell phone is expected to provide seamless connectivity, enhanced computing experience and other attractive features like high resolution camera, high quality music player etc. A new study on how people in India use mobile computing devices suggests that users can devise new and innovative uses for them, if they have sufficient motivation. Considering all such needs and expectations of modern Indian consumer, Nokia has introduced in market the all new Nokia C5 Smartphone in march 2010.

Don’t be baffled by the looks of Nokia C5 , as though the phone looks simple but involves advanced features for users. Nokia C5 relies on 3G network coverage for connecting with the Internet. If we talk about the size of Nokia C5, the phone is quite handy to use with 112 x 46 x 12.3 mm dimensions. The phone has not only vibrations and mp3 sound modes but also comes with 3.5 mm audio jack stereo speakers. You can not only store unlimited number of phone entries, photo calls but can also save call record for 30 days. In order to swap media files, Nokia C5 is provided with Bluetooth as well as a portable USB device for keeping back up of the shared information.

Karbonn K1212

This mobile phone has got to feature the personalized CD interface audio player which enables DJing by pulling, pushing, and rotating a disk which thus reveals to the audio and visual treat. The phone is also embedded with social media applications such as Facebook, Twitter, MSN, orkut etc., It is loaded with variety of additional features Email support, FM radio, expandable memory upto 8GB, long battery life, video recorder, Bluetooth etc.

The Karbonn K1212 is considered as a great value-for-money device which thus offers a set of amazing features at extremely attractive prices. The dual-SIM K1212 sports is studded with a full 8.1 cm touchscreen that imparts it a complete visual experience. This mobile is equipped with pre-embedded social networking apps, a 3.2 megapixel camera, answering machine and a host of other features. Owing to all these features, this mobile phone has been priced reasonably.

After the launch of this phone, more and more users are putting their promise on using these mobile phones. These are rich mobile phones offering great value proposition for Indian mobile phone users. As we have started, we have continued to offer a great line of stunning mobile phones to the customers. These superior and world class mobile phones and thus, introduce more such great devices all the price points and segments.

Nokia 770 Internet Tablet: A Unique Device

Nokia 770 internet tablet is a unique product. It is different from any other tablet PC or PDA. The Nokia Internet is a small handheld computer and mobile phone, incorporating several latest features expected from devices like tablet, PDA, portable gaming console and more.

This Nokia device is perfect for the people who want to stay connected all the times without carrying heavy load. Professionals or techies would love to have this amazing device. It offers better internet experience than offered by a PDA or Smartphone. This device is powered by Linux. It measures 5.5in x 3.1in x 0.7in.

When you buy this Nokia Internet Tablet, in the box you will get Nokia 770 Internet Tablet, carrying pouch, a sliding protective cover, 64MB RS-MMC card/ adapter, a cool plastic stand, USB cable, charger and guide.

It is designed with admiring features such as huge 4.13 inch touch screen with 800 x 480 resolutions, supporting 16-bit colors. It is powered by a 250MHz TI 1710 OMAP (ARM-based) CPU. It has a great memory with 64 MB and additional 64 MB can be added via RS MMC card.

As for connectivity, it is equipped with features such as Bluetooth, built-in Wi-Fi, 802.11b/g, memory card expansion, audio out and AC power adapter. It comes with a 1500 mAh Li-ion battery that offers 3 hours browsing time and 7 hours standby time.

This Nokia mobile phone includes the Opera Web Browser in its ROM. Moreover, it is equipped with a highly functional email client, audio, video and internet radio streaming applications. This device offers better internet experience than offered by the other Windows enabled devices. Its wireless connectivity using integrated Wi-Fi is as good as any laptop. The internet connectivity and functionality are the front-end features of this device.

Micromax Q2: doubling your fun

Micromax Q2 is a dual sim phone which has ‘N’ number of high class features to offer you great experience of ultimate fun and entrainment. This baby magic has got the so smooth and accessible dimension of 112.2x61.2x13mm and acceptable weight of 97gms only. It has got the full support of QWERTY keypad and 2.2inches sensitive TFT touchscreen that has smart resolution of 176x220pixel and 256K shades of colors. This sleek and graceful handset stimulates your sense and makes you to grab it. The dual sim Micromax Q1 comes equipped with a primary camera which has got the quality resolution that results in pin-sharp and colorful images and facilitate your camera work. Even, this camera allows you to trap your happy personal and memorable moments just with an impulsive start button.
